statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_turnover ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory_turnover WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, turnover_rate, price FROM inventory_turnover WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover WHERE quantity < 5 OR price > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_stock FROM stock_forecast WHERE forecasted_stock > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock_forecast;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate, forecasted_stock FROM inventory_turnover JOIN stock_forecast ON inventory_turnover.product_id = stock_forecast.product_id;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_stock FROM stock_forecast;
SELECT forecasted_stock, product_id FROM stock_forecast;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, turnover_rate FROM inventory ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 20;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT inventory.product_id, stock_forecast.forecast_quantity FROM inventory INNER JOIN stock_forecast ON inventory.product_id = stock_forecast.product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM stock_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) as total_sales FROM sales JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.product_id GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, name, turnover_rate FROM Inventory ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, name, contact_info FROM Supplier;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT s.sale_id, i.name, s.sale_amount, s.sale_date FROM Sales s INNER JOIN Inventory i ON s.product_id = i.product_id ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT sf.forecast_id, i.name, sf.forecasting_date, sf.forecasted_quantity FROM StockForecast sf INNER JOIN Inventory i ON sf.product_id = i.product_id WHERE sf.forecasted_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sf.forecasting_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, COUNT(sf.forecast_id) AS total_forecasts FROM Supplier s LEFT JOIN StockForecast sf ON s.supplier_id = sf.product_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING total_forecasts > 0 ORDER BY total_forecasts DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover_rate;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_details;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM stock_needs_forecast WHERE predicted_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover_rate WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_details ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, supplier_name FROM product_details JOIN suppliers ON product_details.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM purchase_orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
